Package com.hexaware.dao

Class CrimeAnalysisServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.hexaware.dao.CrimeAnalysisServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICrimeAnalysisService
public class CrimeAnalysisServiceImpl extends Object implements ICrimeAnalysisService
This class implements the interface ICrimeAnalysisService and provides methods to interact with the database
